## Healthcare Infections & Antibiotic Resistance      
  
.pad-left[
- **Healthcare-associated infections**: ~ 1.7 million cases, 100k deaths in US annually  

    - 1 in 25 US hospital patients have care-related infection
  
    - limits the success of surgery, cancer treatment, organ transplantation   
  
    - 5-10% absolute attributable mortality (CDI & VAE)     
    
- HAIs drive an epidemic of **antibiotic resistance**:  

     - antibiotic failure & recurrent infection
     
     - built environment   
  
]



---

## A New Paradigm for Bacterial Infection    
  
.pad-left[
- <u>High-throughput sequencing</u>: a new lens on complex microbial communities  
   
- <u>Fecal microbiota transplant (FMT)</u>: "ecobiotic" therapies exert large effects   

- **A new molecular epidemiology of infectious diseases:**  

     - new <u>microbiome</u> measures & interventions  

     - reframe familiar outcomes and exposures (e.g., antibiotics)
  
     - integrate methods and tools from microbial ecology  
     
     - need for new modeling and computational approaches     
     
]

## A Distance Model for MDRO Detection     

.pad-left[

- Distance as a "continuous category" (closer points share information)  
  
- GP*: a prior over functions, with 2 parameters: mean function and covariance function  
  
- Covariance function -- RBF kernel (exponentiated quadratic kernel):  
  
    - $\rho$ parameter: length scale (measure of influence on neighboring points)
    
    - $\alpha$: marginal standard deviation (average distance from mean function)
  
- Bayesian framework: $\rho$ parameter has prior, but data informs posterior  
  
.footnote[[*] Neal RM _Bayesian Statistics_ 1998]
]



---

## Generalized Linear Model     

.pad-left[
  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = \beta \cdot distance_i + \alpha + \epsilon$$  
  

]



---

## Generalized Linear Model + Random Effect      

.pad-left[
  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = \beta \cdot distance_i + \alpha + \epsilon$$  
  
<hr style="background-color:#000000">

  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = \beta_{MDRO[i]} \cdot distance_i + \alpha_{MDRO[i]} + \epsilon$$  
  

]



---

## Generalized Linear Model + GP Prior    

.pad-left[
  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = GP_{MDRO[i]}(distance_i) + \alpha + \epsilon$$  
  

  
]



---

## Generalized Linear Model + GP Prior + Random Effect    

.pad-left[
  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = GP_{MDRO[i]}(distance_i) + \alpha + \epsilon$$  
  
<hr style="background-color:#000000">
  
  $$MDRO \sim Bernoulli(p_i)$$  
  
  $$logit(p_i) = GP_{MDRO[i]}(distance_i) + \alpha_{{subject[i]}} + \epsilon$$  
  
  
]
